The photograph in question started circu: claiming to show a police officer resembling the "Chad" internet meme.

The original photograph was taken by Sco: 2016, during a protest in Chicago following the shooting death of Pierre Loury, a 16-year-old teenager. The photograph is available via Getty Images.
